full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,NOR LHA CHOS SKYONG RNAMS KYIS BSANGS BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004B (CES PA 'DI NI PHYOGS BCU'I BZHUGS PA'I BLA MA YI DAM SANGS RGYAS BYANG SEMS MKHA' 'GRO CHOS SKYONG TSOGS BCAS KHYAD @005A *, ,PAR DZAM BHA LA SER NAG DKAR LHANG LHA MO NOR RGYUN MA RGYAL CHEN RNAM SRAS SOGS, ,RTA BDAG BRGYAD DANG KU BEE RA NOR LHA A'A RYA RE MANTA PA RnA SHA WA RI PI TZI KUNDHA LI DANG, PANYDZA LI KA GA-YANG LHA BCAS RNAMS DANG, LHA KLU GZA' SKAR BAS BDAG YUL LHA ME LHA THAB LHA SRUN DGU'I 'DI RNAMS BSANGS MCHOD ZHES BYA BA YAN YON NI SEMS CAN THAMS CAD LA PHAN BDE STZOL, ,NOR MED PA 'GRO BA NOR RGYUN 'PHEL, ,ZAS GOS MED PA 'GRO BA ZAS GOS 'PHEL 'GYUR RO, ,PHYUGS BZHI'I MED 'GRO PHYUGS BZHI'I GA-YANG 'PHEL BAR GYUR RO, ,GA-YANG STOBS BSOD NAMS @005B 'BOD PA'I DUS 'DI BSANGS MCHOD 'BUL BA BTAB, ,MI NOR ZAS GOS GOD KHA SPYANG SHOR JAG RKUN MA YAMS NAD RIMS NAD GNOD PA PHO MO PHUNG SRING GNOD 'GONG PO THE'U RANG 'BYUNG PO MI DANG ME MA YIN GYIS GNOD PA KHYAD PAR MI NOR PHYUGS LA GOD KHA MI 'GYUR RO, ,MTHUN RKYEN TSE DANG BSOD NAMS DPAL 'BYOR ZAS DKAR 'O MA ZHO DAR CHANG SOGS 'PHEL BAR 'GYUR RO, ,DGE SLONG GZUGS 'DZIN DU AARTHA SIDDHI'I MING CAN GYIS BRIS SU SBYAR BA DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,SHIN TU 'GRO BA RNAMS KYI GSANG BYA'O, ,)
